subject: Hockey, Ice
NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
lead_paragraph: Union College reached the Frozen Four for the first time with a 4-2 win against Massachusetts-Lowell in the N.C.A.A. East Regional in Bridgeport, Conn.
snippet: Union College reached the Frozen Four for the first time with a 4-2 win against Massachusetts-Lowell in the N.C.A.A. East Regional in Bridgeport, Conn.
